Motion Designer

Remote

üîç –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏:

This groundbreaking technology replicates and mimics the original development environment of any game. Currently, the company is conducting proof of concept studies with top-tier gaming companies, demonstrating significant improvements across essential parameters.

Made Task (Efficient Systems Limited)
Belgrade 

üîç –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏:

üë§ –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É:

- Excellent organizational and time management skills.
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
- Proficiency in Google Work Space.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.
- English level - B2.

- Administrative work, maintenance of office equipment and general secretarial duties.

Senior Node.js/Typescript Developer for AI product company

Remote

üîç –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: 

We are seeking a Senior Fullstack Developer specializing in Node.js and TypeScript to join our stealth mode startup focused on AI-driven technology for enhancing software quality. This role is pivotal in developing and maintaining our software solutions, leading architecture decisions, and ensuring high code quality through advanced testing and deployment strategies.

As a Senior Fullstack Developer specializing in Node.js and TypeScript, you will play a pivotal role in building robust, scalable, and innovative software solutions. You will be directly involved in designing, implementing, and maintaining our core products, working closely with a cross-functional team to push the boundaries of AI-driven development tools.

üë§ –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É:

‚óè Bachelor's or master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. (not primary)
‚óè Minimum of 5 years of experience in full-stack development with a focus on Node.js and TypeScript.
‚óè Experience with server-side frameworks and RESTful API design.
‚óè Strong understanding of database management and storage solutions (SQL, NoSQL).
‚óè Familiarity with DevOps principles and CI/CD pipelines (Docker, Jenkins, etc.).
‚óè Excellent problem-solving skills, ability to think algorithmically and handle complex project requirements.
‚óè Very good English level
‚óè Working experience in growing international and multicultural product/SAAS startups

‚úçÔ∏è –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏: 

‚óè Develop and maintain high-quality software solutions using Node.js and TypeScript.
‚óè Collaborate with product managers and engineers to ideate, design, and launch new features.
‚óè Focusing mostly on the backend services.
‚óè Ensure consistent code quality and functionality with automated testing and continuous integration practices.
‚óè Participate in code reviews and promote best practices in software development.
‚óè Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.
‚óè Engage with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions.

–û—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—é: @alinarecruit

Online Payments specialist

Firebird Tours
Belgrade 

üîç –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: 

Firebird Tours is an international travel company, industry leader in organized travel to Europe, and  Asia. Servicing customers from 50 countries over 14 years.

üë§ –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É:

- English language (B1).
- Advanced knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel).
- 1-3 years of relevant experience either in finance or payments is a plus.
- Strong analytical and data analysis skills.
- Data-driven decision making.
- Good written communication skills.

‚úçÔ∏è –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏: 

- Payment fraud monitoring using anti-fraud systems to decrease decline transactions balancing chargebacks levels and client friction.
- Review and reconcile partner accounts and company orders.
- Represent chargeback disputes to pursue loss recovery.
- Generate reports and conduct data analysis.

- Opportunity to work with advanced top-of-the-line software for travel management;
- Interesting, challenging tasks and a world-class team.

Secretary / Receptionist

TA Advisory
Belgrade 

üîç –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: 

Based in Geneva, Switzerland, TA Advisory is a boutique law firm with a team of experienced and knowledgeable attorneys that have practiced at leading firms, including top tier international law firms, and graduated from top tier national or regional law schools. Our practice areas include international litigation and dispute resolution, asset tracing and recovery, cross-border transactions and corporate matters (such as venture capital, mergers and acquisitions and private offerings). Our firm has offices in Geneva, Zurich, Belgrade and Dubai.

Senior Python Developer

Remote

üîç –û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: 

Our early-stage startup founded by successful entrepreneurs with backing from reputable venture capitalists, is pioneering a groundbreaking AI-driven financial planning and analysis platform for corporate finance departments. This innovative solution is poised to revolutionize the FP&A software market.
We are currently seeking a highly motivated and experienced backend developer to join our dynamic team. We value independent, self-driven individuals with a strong track record in system design and hands-on skills. This is an exceptional opportunity to become part of our core team as we embark on an exciting journey to bring a disruptive product to market.

We are in search of a senior backend developer with a minimum of 6 years of experience, possessing in-depth knowledge of Python and data systems, and a passion for code quality, architecture, design, testing, and performance. The ideal candidate should have previous exposure to cloud systems, web technologies, and testing methodologies, with prior experience in startup environments or Israeli companies.
As a core team member, you will play a pivotal role in strategy development, product design, and customer solutions, working towards building a scalable and secure platform that delivers an exceptional user experience to our business clients.

üë§ –¢—Ä–µ–±–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∫ –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—É:

- Extensive backend development experience, with a strong focus on Python and AWS.
- Substantial experience in technical leadership roles within startup environments.
- Enthusiasm for code quality, architecture, design, testing, and performance.
- Hands-on experience in designing, building, deploying, and maintaining scalable cloud-based systems.
- Solid understanding of critical production systems concepts, including high availability, reliability, security, and scalability.
- Proficiency in cloud infrastructure, databases, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.
- Full-stack or front-end implementation experience is a plus.
- Familiarity with data work and ETL processes is advantageous.
- Previous exposure to financial analysis work is a bonus.

‚úçÔ∏è –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏: 

- Hands-on development of challenging backend production components, infrastructure, and core functionalities.
- Ownership of all engineering aspects throughout the project lifecycle, including research, design, and testing.
- Deployment and monitoring of code in production to ensure an optimal customer experience.
- Active involvement in defining and planning new features in collaboration with the Product Management team.
- Conducting design and code reviews and participating in cross-architecture decisions.
- Analyzing and enhancing the efficiency, scalability, and stability of various backend system components.

–û—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –Ω–∞ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—é: @alinarecruit
